pages.text: Eophrynus is a Carboniferous trigonotarbid whose name means 'dawn whip spider.' Eophrynus were similar to modern spiders but could not produce silk and their abdomen was made up of small plates and spikes.
$(l)Eats:$() N/A$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Bug Meat$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Moss Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Egg Collection Phial
